= QuteBrowser =
	== Basic Keybindings ==
	- j:: Move down
	- k:: Move up
	- h:: Move left
	- l:: Move right
	
	== URLs ==
	- o:: Open new url
	- O:: Open new url in a new tab
	- go:: Edit current url

	== Tabs ==
	- J:: Next tab
	- K:: Previous tab
	- Alt+n:: Switch to the nth tab 
	- d:: Close tab
	- u:: Undo closing tab

	== History ==
	- H:: Go back in history
	- L:: Go forth in history

	== Miscellanaeous ==
	- f:: Display hints
	- ::: Display commandline

	== Searching ==
	- /:: Search
	- n:: Next search result
	- N:: Previous search result
